<small>Also see: **<big>[[H8447|תּוֹר]]</big>**</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּ֫אַר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Lam.4.8|Lam 4:8]]</sup> ==outline, form== (Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תאר‎</span>; according to [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 100</sup> proposes ***something gazed at***, from √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תאר‎</span> = Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***gaze at***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> absolute [[Gen.29.17|Gen 29:17]] +; construct [[Judg.8.18|Judg 8:18]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּאֲרוֺ‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:93q»§ 93q</sup>) [[Isa.52.14|Isa 52:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּאֳרוֺ‎</span> [[1Sam.28.14|1Sam 28:14]] — ***form***, of woman, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְפַת תּ‎</span> [[Gen.29.17|Gen 29:17]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְאֶה‎</span>, \|\| later <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶלֶם וּדְמוּת‎</span> [[Gen.1.26|Gen 1:26]], [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Or. ii. 62</sup>; BN 149), [[Esth.2.7|Esth 2:7]] (+ ***id.***), [[1Sam.25.3|1Sam 25:3]]; [[Deut.21.11|Deut 21:11]] of man, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְפֵהתֿ‎</span> [[Gen.39.11|Gen 39:11]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְאֶה‎</span>), compare [[Isa.52.14|Isa 52:14]] ( + ***id.***), [[Isa.53.2|Isa 53:2]] (+ ***id.***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָדָר‎</span>), [[Judg.8.18|Judg 8:18]], so also [[1Chr.17.17|1Chr 17:17]] (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הור‎</span>) [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>Anal. 68</sup>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ ת‎</span> [[1Sam.16.18|1Sam 16:18]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טוֺבתֿ‎</span> [[1Kgs.1.6|1Kgs 1:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהתָּֿאֳרוֺ‎</span> [[1Sam.28.14|1Sam 28:14]] see [[Lam.4.8|Lam 4:8]] (where by metonymy = ***aspect, visage***); of cattle, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וִיפוֺת ת‎</span> [[Gen.41.18|Gen 41:18]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעוֺת ת‎</span> v[[Gen.41.19|Gen 41:19]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); tree, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַיִת רַעֲנָן יְפֵה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְרִיתֿ‎</span> [[Jer.11.16|Jer 11:16]] ([[BDB#Du|Du]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְפֵיפֵה ת‎</span>, see [[Jer.46.20|Jer 46:20]]).
